{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.19829v1", "title": "Chow groups of braid matroids and relative maps to $\mathbb{P}^1$", "summary": "We provide a modular interpretation for the rational Chow groups of the braid
matroid $B_n$, with respect to the maximal building set, in terms of certain
moduli spaces of genus zero relative stable maps to $\mathbb{P}^1$. We use this
perspective to compute the generating function for the Chow polynomials.", "main_category": "math.AG", "categories": "math.AG,math.CO", "published": "2025-04-28T14:32:32Z"}
